alert.note: Alert for Donley; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 18 at 6:52PM CDT until September 18 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GRAY AND NORTH CENTRAL DONLEY COUNTIES... At 652 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Lake Mcclellan, or 14 miles south of Pampa, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Alanreed and Lake Mcclellan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
